utils

Class TweetPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.TweetPool

  • public class TweetPool
extends java.lang.Object
    Pool of tweets reprsenting tweets that are already saved and tweets that going to be saved.
    Author:
    Quentin Baert & Thomas Bernard
